content:
I have a provided a schema that contains intents and entities associated with customer service messages to a food delivery app, YumYum. Provide a json that contains any intents present and after, provide another json with any entities present. Only include entities associated with selected intent(s) and if an entity from the schema is not present in the text, include the entity name and "None" as the entry. 


---

I just ordered some chicken from KFC and the place copied my order 3 times. Can you please cancel 2 of them. I cannot afford this and this was not my fault.
